mdRecord.dcterms:title: General Order No. 2 for Capt. Stigleman from Headquarters of the 6th Brigade by Order of Col. J. A. Early
mdRecord.dcterms:description: General Order No. 2 for Capt. Stigleman from Headquarters of the 6th Brigade, Army of the Potomac at Camp Pryor, July 6, 1861, by order of Col. J. A. Early, Commander of Brigade, signed by F. Gardner Capt. A.A.A. Genl. Subject: baggage of the regiments and companies. 1 original piece.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Soldiers
United States
Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
